name: Angry Dentist - Kids Games FREE Teeth Edition
name_original: Angry Dentist - Kids Games FREE Teeth Edition
description:
Ahh Angry Dentist is YOU! Get your own back and this time BECOME the dentist.

• Extract rotten teeth
• Rinse mouth
• Whiten teeth
• Drill holes
• Scrape plaque

Two game modes - Story and Time Attack

Download NOW 100% FREE!
